title: Organize Fonts
content: Now that I am building a lot of fonts on my computer, does anyone have a great idea how to organize them for easy access when designing? Rather than looking at the sample text in the design programs? I started my own typographic display--but it doesn't stay alphabetical as I keep adding new fonts....and it has become pages long, and time consuming to create.
author: MissDaisy

comments.content: This is something many folks use font management programs for, such as our own Suitcase Fusion. [http://www.extensis.com/suitcase-fusion-4/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416070148/http:/www.extensis.com/suitcase-fusion-4/ "http://www.extensis.com/suitcase-fusion-4/")
